attributes.action: make it possible to ban football teams from playing in matches following poor behaviour on the part of that teams supporters
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The rioting following the Glasgow Rangers match in Manchester illustrates how out of control such a situation can get. By banning a team from playing any further matches, for a set period of time, supporters will be forced to behave in an orderly manner if they wish to continue to see their team play. Following such an instance of mass rioting, in the interests of public safety, the team should be subject to a ban to prevent the supporters having the opportunity to riot again.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
